Description: Name of the pair in format AAA/BBB, where AAA is base asset, BBB is quote asset
Oracle base token
Oracle quote token
The oracle type
The oracle number of scale decimals
Coin denom used for the quote asset
The market ID
The max initial margin ratio a position is allowed to have in the market
The max maintenance margin ratio a position is allowed to have in the market
Fee percentage makers pay when trading
Fee percentage takers pay when trading
Percentage of the transaction fee shared with the relayer in a derivative market
True if the market is a perpetual market. False if the market is an expiry futures market
Status of the market
Minimum tick size that the price required for orders in the market
Minimum tick size of the quantity required for orders in the market
Minimum notional (in quote asset) required for orders in the market
Current market admin's address
Level of admin permissions (the permission number is a result of adding up all individual permissions numbers)
Number of decimals used for the quote token
